SELECT COM_CODE, COM_NUMBER, COM_NAME, COM_GUBUN, COM_BUSCONDITION, COM_ITEM, COM_CEO_NAME, COM_TEL, COM_FAX, COM_ZIPCODE, COM_ADDR1, COM_ADDR2, COM_HOMEPAGE, COM_STATE, COM_LOGO, COM_REGDATE, COM_REGID, COM_UPDATE, COM_UPDATEID, COM_MEMO, CENTER_ID, FLOOR_SEQ, TENN_USEYN, COM_PLAY_FLOOR, CASE a.TENN_USEYN WHEN 'Y' THEN (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(TENN_REC_NOW_CNT),0) FROM tb_compay_tennant e WHERE TENN_REC_END ='Y' AND a.COM_CODE = e.COM_CODE ) ELSE '사용안함' END TENN_INFO, CASE a.TENN_USEYN WHEN 'Y' THEN (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(TENN_REC_COUNT),0) FROM tb_compay_tennant e WHERE TENN_REC_END ='Y' AND a.COM_CODE = e.COM_CODE ) ELSE '사용안함' END TENN_TOTAL_INFO FROM TB_COMPANYINFO a WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMPANYINFO(COM_CODE, COM_NUMBER, COM_NAME, COM_GUBUN, COM_BUSCONDITION, COM_ITEM, COM_CEO_NAME, COM_TEL, COM_FAX, COM_ZIPCODE, COM_ADDR1, COM_ADDR2, COM_HOMEPAGE, COM_STATE, COM_LOGO, CENTER_ID, FLOOR_SEQ, COM_REGDATE, COM_REGID, COM_UPDATE, COM_UPDATEID, COM_MEMO, TENN_USEYN, COM_PLAY_FLOOR) VALUES (#{comCode}, #{comNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comName}, #{comGubun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comBuscondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comCeoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comAddr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comAddr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comHomepage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{centerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floorSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GETDATE(), #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GETDATE(), #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tennUseyn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{comPlayFloor,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
